attributes.action: ensure that no Scottish politicians can hold a position in an English Cabinet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Scotland has its own government I feel that it is wrong that the English people have Scottish politicians making decisions for their future.Why should England be controlled by "foreign" Nationals.Surely there is a conflict of interests here?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
